data.title: Lobster Films
data.text: Created in 1985, Lobster Films is a team whose goal is to restore films and share their discovery and their passion for cinema - from the early days until today. A unique cinematheque, a rare films catalogue (from Georges Méliès to the RKO collection, from Jacques Prévert to Nelly Kaplan), a restoration laboratory, a recording studio, a producer, a DVD editor and organizer of concert films... Lobster Films encourage all participations in the sharing and the recognition of the unknown wonders of cinema.
